text: Fausto Puccini (4 November 1932 - 1 April 2016) was an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Fausto Puccini
